Actions.Name: Rabble
Actions.Effect: Target foe takes 2 damage once again for every other [name] member in adjacent spaces to them, up to three times.

Actions.Name: Rush
Actions.Effect: Up to three members in any order may dash 2, then deal 1 damage to a foe and shove them 1 space.

Actions.Name: Rally
Actions.Effect: Up to three allies adjacent to a member may dash 1 space, or one ally adjacent to a member may dash 3 spaces.
